programme.title: Alert: Missing Persons Unit S3

programme.desc: It’s the final day and the ultimate mission, the final round table banishing; then the surviving players will gather at ‘The Fire of Truth’, where either Traitors or Faithful will win the prize pot.

programme.title: So Help Me Todd S1

programme.title: Chicago Fire S13

programme.title: Chicago P.D. S12

programme.desc: It’s the final day and the ultimate mission, the final round table banishing; then the surviving players will gather at ‘The Fire of Truth’, where either Traitors or Faithful will win the prize pot.

programme.title: So Help Me Todd S1
programme.desc: When Veronica appears at the law firm requesting a favor from Todd, he agrees to help but soon realizes she may be out for revenge. Also, Margaret is upset when she is taken off a high-stakes case.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S7
programme.desc: Michael Strahan returns as the host and he's bringing the hottest names in film, TV, sports and entertainment like Olympian Lindsey Vonn, comedian Russell Peters, and Seinfeld stars Jason Alexander.

programme.title: Survivor S48
programme.desc: Eighteen new castaways will be abandoned on the islands of Fiji, where they must survive. Tribes must claim victory in the first challenge of the season to earn essential camp supplies.

programme.title: Britain's Got Talent S18
programme.desc: Britain’s most treasured variety talent show. Bigger than ever before with even more awe-inspiring and show-stopping performers all vying to impress the judges and be the final winner.

programme.title: Alert: Missing Persons Unit S3
programme.desc: The series continues to follow detectives Jason Grant and Nikki Batista of the Philadelphia Police Department's Missing Persons Unit (MPU) as they undertake intense searches for missing individuals.

programme.title: The Traitors S1
programme.desc: Alan Cumming invites you into The Traitors Reunion. The Season 1 cast settle the score on all of the deceptions, murders, banishments, and treachery. Hosted by none other than Andy Cohen.

programme.title: So Help Me Todd S1
programme.desc: Margaret represents a gifted 17-year-old hacker charged with releasing classified defense documents and faces off against her college nemesis. Also, Todd is tasked with babysitting the teen hacker for the duration of the trial.

programme.title: The Goldbergs S2
programme.desc: Beverly panics over being abandoned when she’s old, while Barry demands that Erica set him up on a date with her friend Lainey

programme.title: American Idol 2025
programme.desc: Human emotions is at the heart of American Idol, as we watch ordinary people bring their dreams and ambitions to the famous stage. American Idol contunues to be the world’s favourite singing competition!

programme.title: Matlock S1
programme.desc: Follows Madeline "Matty" Matlock as she rejoins the work force at a prestigious law firm, where she uses her unassuming demeanor and wily tactics to win cases and expose wrong doing.

programme.title: Entertainment Tonight
programme.desc: The foremost authority on breaking entertainment news since its debut, ENTERTAINMENT TONIGHT is the No. 1 syndicated entertainment newsmagazine in the world.

programme.title: American Idol 2025
programme.desc: Human emotions is at the heart of American Idol, as we watch ordinary people bring their dreams and ambitions to the famous stage. American Idol contunues to be the world’s favourite singing competition!

programme.title: Assassin Club
programme.desc: An assassin is offered a contract to kill seven people, and quickly discovers the seven ‘targets’ are also assassins with contracts to kill him.

programme.title: What Happens Later
programme.desc: Two ex-lovers, Bill and Willa, get snowed in at a regional airport overnight. Indefinitely delayed, Willa, a magical thinker, and Bill, a catastrophic one, find themselves just as attracted to and annoyed by one another as they did decades earlier. But as they unpack the riddle of their mutual past and compare their lives to the dreams they once shared, they begin to wonder if their reunion is mere coincidence, or something more enchanted.

programme.title: Buddy Games: Spring Awakening
programme.desc: Dan Bakkedahl, Kevin Dillon, Josh Duhamel and pals reunite to face their biggest challenge yet in the hilarious, outrageous sequel to the hit comedy!

programme.title: Truth Or Dare
programme.desc: A harmless game of 'truth or Dare' among friends turns deadly when someone--or something--begins to punish those who tell a lie--or refuse the dare.

programme.title: The Kite Runner
programme.desc: A California-based writer from Afghanistan must return home to face his past after a phone call from a friend of his father's.

programme.title: Hop
programme.desc: An out-of-work slacker accidentally injures the Easter Bunny (voiced by Russell Brand) and must take him in as he recovers.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend Of The Seven Seas
programme.desc: Brad Pitt and Catherine Zeta-Jones lend their voices to this adventure-filled animated tale.

programme.title: Wonka

programme.title: Fences
programme.desc: Set in 1950s Pittsburgh, Fences takes a passionate look at former Negro-league baseball player Troy Maxson and his family.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A girl asked to be maid of honor at her best friend’s wedding must face off with an alpha bridesmaid who wants to take over her job and best friend status.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: After a car crash, a woman wakes up in an underground bunker with a stranger, who claims to have saved her from the apocalypse in the outside world.

programme.title: Sleeping Dogs
programme.desc: An ex-homicide detective with memory loss is forced to solve a brutal murder he can't recall.

programme.title: Disturbia
programme.desc: A teenager under house arrest begins spying on his neighbours, one of whom he suspects is a killer.

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend Of The Sword
programme.desc: Acclaimed filmmaker Guy Ritchie brings his dynamic style to the classic Excalibur myth, tracing Arthur’s journey from the streets to the throne.

programme.title: Reagan

programme.title: Reality

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

That's why he's been making the toys go wonky! Noddy helps Fuse uninstall the upgrade and soon everyone is back to normal. Well done Noddy!

programme.desc: Based on webtoon, Soo-ji transferred to Baekyeon Girls' High School, only to find out a strange voting is being held once a month in her class, and the person with lowest votes becomes the target of school violence. This month, she got the lowest votes...

programme.title: Death Forest
programme.desc: The students of a school go on a trip not knowing what's in there can I survive The mysterious ghost of the forest and just like that it's a bloody massacre.

programme.title: The Anchor
programme.desc: Se-Ra is a famous anchor on a broadcasting station. Five minutes before her news broadcast is to go live, she receives a phone call. The caller, Mi-So, tells Se-Ra: "I am going to be killed by someone. Please cover the story of my death."

programme.title: Wind River
programme.desc: A veteran hunter helps an FBI agent investigate the murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation.

programme.title: Miracle: Letters To The President
programme.desc: Dreaming of making a train station for his sister and the villagers, Joon-kyung sends many letters to the president, but with no reply. Ra-hee, who has a crush on Joon-kyung, does everything she can to help him meet the president.

programme.title: Isabelle
programme.desc: A young couple's dream of starting a family shatters as they descend into the depths of paranoia and must struggle to survive an evil presence that wants nothing more than their very own lives.

programme.title: Bad Man
programme.desc: Na Yoo-Mi , was found dead because of an accident according to police report. But her husband, Han Byung-Do believes that it was related to Baek Dong-II, so he go after Baek Dong-II for revenge.

programme.title: The Wall
programme.desc: An American sharpshooter engages in a deadly game of cat and mouse with an Iraqi sniper, who has him pinned behind a small chunk of concrete.

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A man commits an unethical act in an attempt to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him.

programme.title: Ditto
programme.desc: Yong hears a stranger's voice from the future, connecting them to each other and sharing their love stories.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow
programme.desc: A reforming ex-gangster tries to reconcile with his estranged policeman brother, but the ties to his former gang are difficult to break

programme.title: Dragon Fist
programme.desc: A dishonored student of the Dragon Fist Sect seeks revenge for the death of his teacher.

programme.title: School Tales
programme.desc: Marching band members tempt fate by testing ghostly legends surrounding their annual band camp school

programme.title: Hide And Seek
programme.desc: When a wealthy businessman follows a lead to find his missing brother, he dives headlong into a twisted underworld of squatters and vagrants that threatens to tear apart his family as he struggles to maintain his sanity.

programme.title: The Secret Life Of Owls
programme.desc: This stunning series uncovers 'The Secret Life Of Owls' as never seen before, using a special camera rig to follow families of owls in a wild corner of rural Essex, through winter, spring and summer.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2
programme.desc: Rediscover the Tet Offensive: two months of battles that killed more than 15,000 American and Allied troops, and triggered anti-war protests across the U.S. Explore reports, images, and combat footage, much of which hasn’t been seen since 1968.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2
programme.desc: Experience a chronological recounting of the Apollo 13 near-disaster, one of NASA’s most devastating—and finest—moments. Witness the events of April 1970 as they unfolded through news footage, mission control audio, and NASA archives.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s primate team prepare to welcome a new birth.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s vet team commences critical care to save the life of an endangered sea turtle snared on a fishing line, and after 3 years without tigers at the Zoo, the team stand by to welcome a new big cat.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: We follow Auckland Zoo’s bird team into the wilds of the Coromandel Ranges as they help to save native kiwi populations, It’s a feeding frenzy for the Tasmanian devils and the elephant team faces their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, there's shocking news for the elephant team, the vets are concerned about one of their rescued Little penguins, and we find out how it really does take a community to feed the Zoo.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Wildest Survival

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: The instinct to secure a mate is one of the most powerful that there is. From the beautiful to the bizarre, this episode explores the most amazing mating rituals from right across the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: It is now June, and the park is bathed in 17 hours of daylight. With the warm temperatures come rich pickings, but for the newborn the summer months are crucial as they learn to fight, find food and avoid predators.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Autumn is when stags compete to breed, osprey chicks begin a 3000-mile migration to West Africa, salmon return to the rivers where they were born and adders give birth to live young.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai and Rigby try to seize an opportunity to eat a piece of cake, and it comes when they learn that Skips' birthday is coming soon.

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: When the catering company is robbed, the gang cooks up a reliable guard dog to keep it safe.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: After a rainstorm, a puddle queen materializes at the farm. She woos Eustace and drags him down into her puddle world. Muriel is heartbroken, of course, so Courage must save Eustace.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Tired of Mordecai always beating him at punchies and getting his way, Rigby decides to learn the martial art of "Death Kwon Do".

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: Endive starts to feel guilty after one of her pranks on Mung goes too far.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: Vacationing on a cruise ship that sinks, Muriel, Courage and the Farmer end up on a deserted island. The one inhabitant they find is Katz, who runs an unusual 'resort.'

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: An old metal box found by chance in a recess of a cliff brings back childhood memories for Grizzy and the Lemmings. They nostalgically recall the first time they met, when they were still kids.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get their hands on a secret weapon that belongs to the Canadian Army: anyone hit with it becomes non-violent. They use the arm to transform Grizzy into a cherub, despite himself.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy go bowling - but it's hard work, especially when his fingers get stuck in a ball!

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin put Anais' new friend -- Josh -- through a series of tests, to see if he's good enough for their sister. However, when the boys' extreme methods start freaking Josh out, he questions whether being Anais's friend is worth the trouble. So Gumball and Darwin end up having to convince Josh to give Anais a second chance.

programme.title: Unikitty
programme.desc: Unikitty and the gang are having a great time at the public pool, until they try to get Puppycorn to swim in the deep end with them.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom & Jerry help Tyke with a splinter.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput backstage of a magic show but get tripped up by the contraptions there. They end up on stage as the Magician is about to perform his death-defying tricks.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pauleen Penguin hires The Looney Builders to build her a home in Looneyburg. Lola soon discovers they got the design wrong and the crew has to make adjustments.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Porky and Daffy open a coffee shop.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings: World Tour
programme.desc: Grizzy uses a hen who mistakes the Yummy jars for her eggs as anti-Lemming protection system.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: It's the start of a Fun Run. Mr. Bean lines-up beside his deadly enemy: the fat bloke who stole his parking space. Fun Run or no, nothing will stop Bean beating this man to the finishing post, even if he has to flag a cab.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin spice up their friendship by introducing a third best friend.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam when he's in a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her as a Batwheel - if he can convince her to stop playing long enough to focus on their mission!

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: /With a parasitic alien on the loose in their school, the Powerpuff Girls and Bliss have to find a way to stop it before the big dance.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Avast mateys! Clarence and Sumo are psyched to play their pirate-themed board game, Thirty Days and Seven Seas, until they learn Jeff has invited boring old Breehn along.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: When her teammates turns evil it's up to Lady Legasus to stop the League of Legs.

programme.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
programme.desc: Cheese is bonked on the head and believes she's a big celebrity!

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike falls in love with a french poodle, who is actually friends with Tom.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Once every 10 years, a mysterious glowing dragon visits Berk and this year Hiccup and Astrid are determined to find out where it's coming from – and stop it from reaching the village.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Our team’s startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a “Space Race”, competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend “moon landing” for a baby – a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling “Adult Babies” before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina’s startup company for exploding baby Iggy’s favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp’s current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Sharzod hates feeling indebted to Tip after being rescued and tries to get "even"; Police King Kyle must solve the case of Sharzod's missing mojo.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Smoove Move goes from underground street artist to world-famous pedicurist and lets his newfound fame go to his head. // Thieving hermit crabs steal the crew's shells, so they concoct an elaborate heist to get them back.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: A fierce windstorm traps the gang inside the garage and they have fun together all night, but once the food runs out they team up to find a way out.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard visit a fellow Wizard in Mumbai to take part in a big Bollywood dance number. But when Odlulu uses the Follow-the-Leader Key to lead all the dancers away in order to dance with her, it’s up to the Wanderers to get the key AND the dancers back

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has decided that the jingly jangly jungle is not jingly or jangly enough. He and his friends make lots of noise, but soon learn that they need to work together to make a wonderful jingly jangly jungle noise.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: All the toys in Toyland are visiting Fuse's workshop for a toy check but something is wrong! Toys are fine before the check and wonky after! Noddy investigates why toys are going wonky so that he can help them return to normal quickly. With the help of his wwwbook and following all the clues Noddy works out that Fuse has given himself a robot upgrade to help him do the toy checks quickly but he installed it incorrectly. That's why he's been making the toys go wonky! Noddy helps Fuse uninstall the upgrade and soon everyone is back to normal. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Diggly is bored of the same old scraps every day. Fifi and Bumble decide to make him a pumpkin pie as a surprise. But there's no flour left to make the pastry, what will they use instead?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!

Will Tag and Scooch be able to save their movie before time runs out? / When Tag's construction project accidentally damages Frank and Beans’ house, she invites them to stay with her family during repairs. programme.title: Team Zenko Go

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.desc: Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. programme.desc: When Dulcinea searches for clues on the Crown of Souls, she finds the author of the Wee Compendium book and holds him hostage until she gets answers

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict “no-babies” policy. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits’ fun playtime. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he’s applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby’s cover at stake, it’s up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: The gang competes to see who can best train a Terrible Terror, while Alvin is closing in on Berk.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When different species of dragons are found on Dragon Island, the kids suspect that the Screaming Death might be back and it's up to an unlikely hero to save the day.

programme.title: Stars' Top Recipe at Fun-Staurant

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. Top male reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle till the end in front of five celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then…

programme.title: Lumayo Ka Nga Sa Akin

programme.title: Dahil May Isang Ikaw
programme.desc: Anya (Regine Velasquez) accidentally bumps Andrew's (Aga Muhlach) car while backing up. Both were arguing whose fault it was. Later Anya discovers that Andrew is her client and she apologizes. She offers to treat him out to dinner. This becomes the start of the proverbial beautiful friendship.

programme.title: Pagdating ng Panahon
programme.desc: Lynette (Sharon Cuneta) is a conservative & religious lady who leads a boring life. So when she gets a marriage proposal from Manuel (Robin Padilla), whose family is known to be a brood of chauvinists, she was ecstatic.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?

programme.title: Tuli

programme.title: The Nanny S2 E24 - Strange Bed Fellows

programme.title: Law & Order Special Victims Unit S10 E07 - Wildlife

programme.title: The Waltons S1 E03 - The Calf
programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: CSI S3 E08 - Snuff
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.desc: Homicide: Life on the Street portrays the raw emotions in the life on the front line and also compels character-driven drama with emotional depth.

programme.desc: The team zeroes in on the island of Bermuda—namesake of the Triangle—and one of the most infamous mysteries that helped establish the dark reputation of these waters.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: At the height of the industrial age, as America's cities go vertical for the first time, a Yale educated medical doctor and Olympic gold medalist turns his attention to toys.

programme.title: The Pickers (S17)
programme.desc: Rockets! Rayguns! Robots! Mike and Frank have a blast encountering out of this world picks.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2)
programme.desc: An Iranian American psychopath is thrown into city jail in Southern California. Before he gets sent to a higher security prison, he escapes by crawling up the plumbing chase of the five-story prison.

programme.desc: When a seller strolls in with a collection of action figures signed by the cast of 'The Walking Dead', will Chum bite? Then, Corey is too cool when a 'Rock n Roll High School' poster comes into the shop.

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Darrel Miklos is embarking on a mission to solve one of the most intriguing mysteries in history: the disappearance of the Nazi's looted WWII treasure, estimated to be worth billions.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S14)
programme.desc: Ancient cultures around the world often referred to gods as 'The Immortals,' but could they have encountered extraterrestrial beings that had achieved eternal life?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: More than 10,000 crop circle formations have been documented in over 50 countries, and many display properties that defy conventional explanations. Are they of otherworldly origin?

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S5)
programme.desc: When a former Navy pilot and UAP whistleblower visits the ranch, an incredible event takes place that leaves the entire team in disbelief.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid
programme.desc: In the Bible, there are two Arks, each designed by God himself. Both the Ark of the Covenant and Noah's Ark were built to protect but lost to history. Did either exist, and if so, where could they be?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: For centuries, humanity has been fixated on Mars - the glowing red orb in the night sky. As a new era of exploration of the Red Planet begins, we are on the cusp of finally solving its mysteries.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: The team's high hopes of finding the fabled treasure are intensified when they procure what could be the final piece of the puzzle.

programme.title: Bakit Kay Tagal Ng Sandali?
programme.desc: Nina (Dina Bonnevie) and Ted (Julio Diaz) are sweethearts. Ted convinces her to accept Don Edmundo's (Eddie Garcia) suit as the old man is said to be dying anyway.

programme.title: Neber 2-Geder
programme.desc: They were totally unlike in their ways and in the kind of girls they become attracted to. Andrew E and Redford White seemed like they were never together but each one was willing to do anything to help the other.

programme.title: Segurista
programme.desc: Made destitute by the eruption of Mount Pinatubo in Central Luzon, Karen decides to work as an insurance underwriter by day and as a guest relation’s officer in a club by night.

programme.title: Barumbado
programme.desc: A young hoodlum spawned and raised by a tough neighborhood goes out looking for love and an escape from the harsh realities of everyday life.

programme.title: Hiram Na Mukha
programme.desc: Famous plastic surgeon Dr. Hugo (Christopher de Leon) worships the ground his fiancee Alicia (Nanette Medved) walks on. That is because he feels Alicia is his creation.

programme.title: Laglag Barya Gang
programme.desc: Ike Lozada has been given the task to nurture and shelter homeless children. Unable to make ends meet, he taught his children to become street hustlers.

programme.title: Boy Chico Hulihin… Ben Tumbling
programme.desc: This is another look at the brief and violent life of 60's hoodlum Ben Tumbling. This version is from the point of view of Boy Chico, the dedicated cop who killed him.

programme.title: Do Re Mi
programme.desc: Donna, Regine and Mikee had one thing in common. They were all dreaming of success as singing stars. Duped by an illegal job recruiter, who promised them a stint in Japan, they decided to strike out on their own by putting up a restaurant where they could also perform.

programme.title: Kamandag ng Kris
programme.desc: A Muslim school teacher and a Christian military general agree to hold talks. But what should have been a step towards peace became a source of added discord when the general is killed in a massacre and the teacher's son is slain in the counter-offensive.

programme.title: Jack & Jill Sa Amerika
programme.desc: Jack and Jill face a new whole adventure in America. When they received a telegram from their dead uncle’s lawyer, they were prompted to go to the US immediately. Thinking she can have everything back, Jack decides to sell her jeepney and exhaust her savings to buy their plane ticket.

programme.title: Sana Bukas Pa Ang Kahapon (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Three friends made their way in the big city. In the end they all thought of the things they should never have done, wondering what might have been had these tomorrows been their yesterdays.

programme.title: Kumusta Ka Hudas
programme.desc: Mario (Rudy Fernandez) and Fidel (Ace Vergel) are best of friends since childhood. But some dissidents set-up Mario and Fidel to look like they betrayed each other. Can the two friends find it in their heart to trust each other again?

programme.title: Tong-Its
programme.desc: Two popular figures in the local music scene, pop singer, Janno Gibbs and master rapper, Francis Magalona teamed up in this comedy about two cops who enjoyed playing a game Tong-its, a popular type of card game.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet two men in Shimane. In Unnan City, Korean Sanghyun uses local rice to brew makgeolli like it's done in his homeland. In Tamatsukuri Onsen, Nepalese Nandeshwar tends the front desk of an inn.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: An iconic story from bunraku puppet theatre features the legendary Princess Yaegaki. See how people living near the lake where the story is set work together to bring the tale back to its roots.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: The Comedy Club Where I Belong
programme.desc: In a stand-up comedy club in Tokyo, people from all over the world try out bilingual jokes. For James from Australia, comedy has changed his life, helping him find a place where he feels he belongs.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: We show how NHK WORLD-JAPAN's app now provides disaster alerts in 11 languages, including push notifications for earthquakes, tsunamis, and severe weather.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Ishihara Yurina has created a workplace and farm in Laos to empower people with disabilities to be self-reliant. She talks about how she's trying to improve social welfare in developing countries.

programme.title: 1/2: People Who Don't Drink
programme.desc: 1 in 2 don't drink in Japan, where intense social drinking is normal. Through interviews of drinkers and non-drinkers we hear both sides, including a couple who went sober and opened a no-alcohol bar.

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, one of the "five greatest swords under heaven": Mikazuki Munechika.

programme.title: Masterpieces of Historic Capitals
programme.desc: Historic capitals in the Kansai region are home to a wealth of national treasures and masterpieces. Discover an array of artworks inspired by Buddhism, international trade, or the nobility.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: Lithium-ion batteries contained in portable products have become an essential part of our daily lives. But accidents caused by batteries catching fire are on the rise. We look at how to stay safe.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: A Japanese hospital has succeeded in having chronic spinal cord injury patients walk without crutches in daily life by using two types of robotic devices in rehabilitation.

programme.title: My Street Piano

programme.title: Going Wild

programme.title: Garden Games

programme.title: Going Boating

programme.title: The Long Grass

programme.title: Zoe Zebra, the Postman's Daughter
programme.desc: Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zoë. Zoë has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. The party is fun, especially as it turns out that Zoë has invited all of Peppa and George’s friends.

programme.title: Painting
programme.desc: Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Dens
programme.desc: Peppa is playing in the tree-house with the girls, and George and the boys stay in the castle that Grandpa Pig built for them. But when it starts to rain and the garden is covered in muddy puddles, they rush out to play together!

programme.title: Special Edition
programme.desc: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.

programme.title: Journeys and Discoveries
programme.desc: A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.

programme.title: History in the Frame
programme.desc: A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.

programme.title: Best Eats
programme.desc: Food connects people! A feast for the eyes that spotlights the cuisines of China in a way that’s bound to set the mouths of the whole globe watering!

programme.title: Youthful China
programme.desc: The youth of a country is the future of that country. A series of documentaries focusing on the younger generation of China in which you get to see what they are achieving and what makes them tick!

programme.title: Pixel Collage
programme.desc: A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

programme.title: Today’s Top Pick
programme.desc: Documentaries in this slot are rebroadcasts of our most-viewed and most popular stories of the season. They feature important social, economic, environmental or other policy-driven issues, affecting lives nationwide or simply in one small village. A broad selection of top productions by Chinese top documentary producers.

programme.title: Humanities and Geography
programme.desc: A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.

programme.title: Living China
programme.desc: Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: Waning Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: Funeral Vigil
programme.desc: Night vigils are done at funerals as the souls are said to linger three days after death. Si is a gambler who only goes home when he needs money from his mother and is not around when she dies. When he learns that his mother has buried treasure at home, Si returns to keep a vigil for her in order to find the treasure. Strange things start to occur…

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Steffanie is so traumatized by her past that she only feels safe online, but her family and friends worry that her online activity is causing harm. Matthew is surviving his teen years through his devices.

programme.desc: Tim and Barbara Pasa meet at a gig Tim is performing at and quickly fall for one another. Barbara is a surgical nurse by day, a fun-loving party animal. They marry quickly, shocking their friends.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: The tire track found at the Donna Bennett Johnston crime scene provided police with a long list of potential suspects, everyone in the Baton Rouge area who had purchased an Aquatred tire.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: When a city official is gunned down in Berryville, shocked residents are left wondering who among them is a cold-blooded killer.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: In Mobile, one teenager is killed and another's life is forever changed when a single decision turns fatal.

programme.title: Phrogging: Hider In My House
programme.desc: After their wedding shower, Timothy and Amanda find uninvited guests in their crawlspace, including a man wearing Amanda's clothes. When Presley Brown hears noises, she lets out a blood-curdling scream.

programme.title: Phrogging: Hider In My House
programme.desc: When noises fill Courtney Randolph's home, her two exes offer help, but she's blind to what's happening around her. Davis Wahlman says he saw a woman jog out of his house, and he gets another surprise.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about action words and describing words. These episodes also teach about sorting and classifying words and following directions.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 5 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagbibigay ng mga mahalagang pangyayari, paksa, at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggan o nabasang teksto. Matutuhan din dito ang wastong pagbaybay sa mga salita at paglalarawan ng tagpuan at tauhan.

programme.title: Grade 5 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about area, volume, and temperature. These episodes also explain line graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 5 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on analyzing visual and multimedia elements and writing paragraphs and articles.

programme.title: Grade 5 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay pag-uusapan ang bahaging ginampanan ng kolonyalismong Espanyol at pandaigdigang koteksto ng reporma sa pag- usbong ng kamalayang pambansa patungo sa pagkabuo ng Pilipinas bilang isang nasyon.

programme.title: Grade 5 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain how weathering and soil erosion shape the Earth’s surface and affect living things and the environment. These episodes also discuss about weather disturbances and their effects, the phases of the Moon and the beliefs and practices, associated with it, and the constellations and the information derived from their location in the sky.

programme.title: Grade 7 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang mga akda ayon sa mga tauhan, kaisipan, at saloobin na nakapaloob dito. Tatalakayin din ang pagsusulat ng sariling pananaw at ideya tungkol sa napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 7 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the key concepts, uses, and importance of statistics, data collection/gathering and the different forms of data representation, measures of central tendency, measures of variability, and probability.

programme.title: Grade 7 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach writing and composing essays. These also feature Philippine literature and theater.

programme.title: Grade 7 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagtugon ng mga Asyano sa mga hamon ng pagbabago, pag-unlad at pagpapatuloy ng Silangan at Timog-Silangang Asya sa Transisyonal at Makabagong Panahon (ika-16 hanggang ika-20 Siglo).

programme.title: Grade 7 Science
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the relation of geographical location of the Philippines to its environment, the different phenomena that occur in the atmosphere, the relationship of the seasons and the position of the Sun in the sky, and the occurrence of eclipses.

programme.title: Grade 9 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng iba't ibang akda na may kaugnayan sa kulturang Asyano batay sa mga elemento nito. Ipapaliwanag din dito kung paano maglahad at maghambing ng mga pananaw.

programme.title: Grade 9 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the basic concepts of trigonometry.

programme.title: Grade 9 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the relevance worth of ideas, soundness of author’s reasoning, and the effectiveness of a presentation. These also explain critical issues that demand sound analysis and call for prompt actions.

programme.title: Grade 9 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa mga sektor ng ekonomiya at mga patakarang pang- ekonomiya nito sa harap ng mga hamon at pwersa tungo sa pambansang pagsulong at pag-unlad.

programme.title: Grade 9 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the projectile motion, impulse and momentum, and conservation of linear momentum, conservation of mechanical energy, the relationship among heat, work, and efficiency. These episodes also talk about generation, transmission, and distribution of electrical energy from power plants to home.

programme.title: Bancs Publics (Versailles Rive Droite)
programme.desc: A banner hanging from the window of a building reads: lonely man. Lucie and her intrigued colleagues investigate in the district. In the streets, in the square at lunchtime, in the corner DIY shop, people come and go. Will the lonely man emerge from the crowd?

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire
programme.desc: Anémone doesn't want to get back in touch with the children from her first marriage without knowing whether her disease is hereditary. Simon confronts his client Sophie who makes the most of the moment to make a dramatic revelation about his father's past.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire
programme.desc: Olivia is disturbed by the death of a teenager who committed suicide. Vincent tells Anémone about a tragedy that happened during his childhood.

programme.desc: October 2008. A vineyard in the Loire Valley becomes witness to a tragedy. Aurélien Pioger, a young seasonal worker is found hung in strange circumstances. The authorities write it off as suicide, but Aurélien's family refuse the verdict. A carefully disguised murder? But who could have wanted him dead?

This is the adventure of an ever-changing country which has become one of the most important in Europe.

programme.title: Partis Rouler
programme.desc: Alexis and Antoine are getting ready to cross the country in search of mountain biking communities in Canada. They are doing last-minute preparations before setting off for the mythical Shore, which lies to the north of Vancouver.

programme.title: C'Est Moi... Marlène Jobert
programme.desc: Veritable icon for a generation, Marlène Jobert played in innumerable films during her long and prestigious career, alternating popular comedies and social dramas. In the 1960s she launched her career in theatre and television, before becoming one of the most popular actresses in French cinema.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: À Travers Champs
programme.desc: The term ''farmer's wife'' is no longer appropriate today, it belongs to another era; even if organizations argue for women to have a greater role in the sector, there is still a long way to go to achieve parity.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Partis Rouler
programme.desc: Alexis and Antoine are getting ready to cross the country in search of mountain biking communities in Canada. They are doing last-minute preparations before setting off for the mythical Shore, which lies to the north of Vancouver.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux
programme.desc: Hatter has to draw up the story of his family for the grand meeting that will be held... tomorrow. But a magical soft toy has made him far too relaxed and Alix tries to make him a bit more dynamic so that he'll finish the task in time.

programme.title: À Travers Champs

programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: À Peine J'Ouvre Les Yeux
programme.desc: Tunis, summer 2010, a few months before the Revolution. Her family already sees her as a doctor, but Farah wants something different. She sings with a politically active rock band. Hayet, her mother, tries to warn her: she can't expect to openly attack the powers-that-be, without there being consequences...

programme.title: Rhin-Mississippi
programme.desc: On a social housing estate near Strasbourg, a group of children have been turfed out of their playground by a gang of young drug dealers. They decide to head off along the Rhine, in search of the Mississippi and Tom Sawyer.

programme.title: L'absente
programme.desc: Alex is visited by her real mother, Sylvie, who had abandoned her as a baby. Laurent has found Marina's murderer. He takes him to his boat and heads out to sea to torture him. Victoire realises that it's Sully, Hélène's ex-partner, who has been kidnapped by Laurent.

programme.title: L'absente
programme.desc: Arrested on his return to harbour, Laurent denies killing Sully. He'd gone fishing and the fish blood masks any evidence the police could have hoped to find. But Victoire is convinced he has taken his revenge. Hélène tells Alex that she has known for a while that she isn't Marina.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne tries to convince her Dad to move to the city while he is visiting. With the help of Sid, she devices a plan that seems too good to fail.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Charlie Dylan must convince the crew that a new kid on the block may not be who he says he is. Myles finds out that honesty is the best policy.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: Anika is noticeably different now she's 'Badika' but will the others realise there's anything wrong? Oliver, Jasmyn and Florian skip out on their house chores to visit Orphans Inc and get an unexpected lead on the missing Jacksons.

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: The gang inadvertently creates a mischievous clone of Taylor! And when clone Taylor runs off with Nori, Meesha, and Lila in hot pursuit, it's down to Ellis and Taylor to figure out how to reverse the cloning process.

programme.desc: Cecil shows Patrick his mustache collection. // The Star family brings a mandrake root into their home.

programme.desc: Squidward and Bubble Bass are forced to tolerate each other's company on a trip to Jetsam City. // Squidward takes a trip inside the imagination box and must rely on SpongeBob and Patrick's creativity in order to escape.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton's family open their own restaurant...directly next to the Chum Bucket. // SpongeBob suddenly finds everything funny...much to everyone's annoyance.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carl's newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.

programme.desc: When Mr. Chang's job might go to a faster train conductor, he has to prove that he can be just as fast as a robot! // Adelaide wants to help the city cats clean up their acts for adoption, but can she help these grumpy gatos?

programme.desc: When the Louds run into Mom's old camp crush turned celebrity at a State Fair, Dad tries to one-up him to impress Rita. // Realizing Mr. Coconuts is missing, Luan rallies the Louds to track him down along Route 66.
